Name: Pichan
Notes: An orange bird NPC that can be talked to. Fluzzard (GliBird) needs to be added as a separate object. It can register a Power Star, however, this requires a properly configured Scenario entry. A complex dialogue with flow nodes should be set up in order to control the minigame.

Obj_arg0.Name: Spawns Power Star?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, it will register a Power Star. Its EventFunc needs to be triggered via an event flow node to make it spawn.

Obj_arg1.Name: Initialize Tutorial?
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, the tutorial controller will be created, thus enabling the tutorial sequence. This only works in gliding stages, namely JungleGliderGalaxy and ChallengeGliderGalaxy.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Very buggy so it shouldn't be used. The object will appear when this switch is activated, but it will always have appeared even if the switch is deactivated. Deactivating the switch again will fix this, though.

SW_A.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_B.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

AppearPowerStar.Description: Gets spawned after triggering its EventFunc.

NamePos.Description: Additional placements that can be freely placed.

Values.Value: レース開始時マリオ位置
ピーチャン位置[スター渡し]

MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.Description: Can be registered to a Starship Mario object appearance event.

Message.Description: The text dialogue's label format is Pichan%03d, where %03d is the text message ID.

EventFunc.Description: Object-specific behavior for EventFunc event flow nodes.

AnimeFunc.Description: Object-specific behavior for AnimeFunc event flow nodes.

BranchFunc.Description: Object-specific behavior for BranchFunc branch flow nodes.

YoshiTargetable.Description: Can be targeted and licked by Yoshi.
